content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside to get my baby monitor and noticed a large and bright white triangle in the sky with sparkling lights on the edges.   i didn't think initially that it was a ufo because i'm not the type to look for them.  i figured it was something affixed to the top of a far off building that was illuminated for the night, maybe for a party... but while looking and thinking i realized it was too large and too odd for that.  still, i didn't think it would move because it just was there for so long and not moving and not making any sound.  it was north of tarzana, where i was located.

so, i bent down to get the baby monitor and my iphone so i could take a picture, and when i looked up it was gone.  i never saw it fly or move, just saw that the sky was once again clear.

this happened between 10 and 10:30 at night.  i told my mother and mother in law when i went in the house.  they were inside playing cards.  we went back outside to look but it didn't come back, the sky was dark.

so, i'm not really sure what it was but all i can say is it was very large, bright and shaped like a triangle.  we watched the eleven o'clock news hoping to see some report on it but there was nothing.  it was too large and obvious not to be seen by many people so i'm wondering why i'm not reading of any other sitings?

coincidentally, the next night we found my little cat dead.  she had survived fine as an indoor outdoor cat for the last 15 years.  we are certain she was killed friday night, the 22nd.  the same time i saw the big triangle.  our little cat was decapitated.  her head cleanly sitting on the lawn.  there was no blood.  next to her, just a leg (partially eaten) just bone left and part of a foot.  again, no blood.  there was also her fur.  we are assuming an animal consumed most of her, we just found it odd that her head was so cleanly cut from her body... and because of that wondered if it was possible it was done by people.  but because so much of her body was missing we figured she was probably eaten.

anyhow, summing it up as one weird night, but that's what happened
content.summary: Big bright white triangle with flashing lights on the exterior.

content.detailedDescription:
Weird lights in the sky give a light show: 
first, i apologize for any typos, as i went in to document this as fast as possible, so as to not forget anything. i was in middle of taking my dog out to relieve herself tonight after dark, and during a commercial break, and was standing outside of my front door. from where i live, we do see planes from an airport nearby. we have airplanes fly over often and i am very familiar with what they look like, sound like and how they act. unfortunately, the very fact of living anywhere near an airport may call credibility of what was witnessed into question. this experience defied any normal plane encounter and i do my best in this testimony to make the needed distinctions between what a normal plane would do compared to what actually happened tonight. most normal people could tell the difference between a plane if they���ve ever seen few and what happened tonight. it was one of the most bizarre things i have ever witnessed. we don���t typically say that with planes and there were no reports of any odd plane problems tonight on the news nor any technological leaps of planes hovering now. also most of us are very aware of the regular light patterns of planes and how they take off and land, and this was nothing like anything we see all the time. exact time of this event may be give or take 45 min, as i hadn���t looked at clock and the show was prerecorded. until tonight i could honestly say i've never actually seen a ufo. we're all accustomed to things flying overhead and lights in sky, but one usually hears it too. especially as low in the sky as these lights were. also, i don���t use drugs, and only drink occasionally but had nothing to drink tonight when this happened or at all in past several days, so given that my neighbors also saw it briefly right at the end, i can honestly say, i didn���t hallucinate this or make this up.

i saw these lights in the sky which behaved in a very bizarre way from any planes or crafts we are accustomed to. they were also totally silent and 1 was there for the entire time and did not leave the spot in front of my door, which totaled about 3-4 minutes at least total and these lights were mostly in the same spot unless otherwise noted. i was outside and afraid to run back in and grab my camera because i knew it'd be gone when i got back so i have no pictures. i would've missed the best part too if i had. 

there was this blinking light in the sky in a place i hadn���t seen any stationary blinking lights before, and was in the air path of take-off/landings for the airport, but not behaving in the customary way we���re used to seeing with planes moving in a straight line in 1 direction. this orb-like light was blinking kind of like when you see a planet appear to blink while the stars around it are stationary. its blinking was similar to that. but it was much too low in the sky, and way too large and near to be either planet or star, and neither move. and usually planes don���t do any of the following: as this single light was blinking, it was also hovering stationary and seemed to be busy doing something but it was dark and so i could not see what the light was doing. i don���t know if it was just a light orb or if it was affixed to a craft. it was changing colors as it blinked, and with each blink became a different color: white, pinkish-white, red, pinkish-yellow, blue, green and they all kind of blended into each other making a very pretty display of rainbow colors. i was perplexed. i don���t know anyone who has seen a plane or craft with color changing lights especially not in a rainbow array of colors. the blinking/flashing effect was very subtle (if compared to something like a strobe light which has a very strong effect) and just beautiful and felt slightly hypnotized by the display. the blinking and color changing was fast and constant, and at 1st i asked myself ���am i really seeing this?��� and blinked my eyes but it was still there. it was there the whole time from beginning to end and the 1st thing i noticed in this sequence of events which caught my attention. 

then after about a minute of blinking and color changing i was even more startled when 3 lights that appeared to be a triangular-shaped craft come out of the blinking light! i was really wishing i���d had my camera for this because i love to do photography and videos and it figures the 1 time i get to see something ufo-like i didn���t have it with me. never in my life did i expect to see color-changing orbs in the sky seeming to give birth to another set of lights! this triangular-shaped set of 3 lights were all the same distance apart from each other and moved together like affixed to a craft, one amber steady (non-blinking) light at each point, however it was too dark to see what this craft looked liked. to me it was like seeing lights on an airplane at night, except airplanes don���t hover in 1 spot and rotate mid-air in that spot like this thing did.

so after the triangular light thing came out of the blinking light i noticed it���s lights did not change color and were not blinking at all, and were a steady amber. it appeared to come out of the blinking light almost backwards from what i could tell, and hovered in the same spot facing the blinking orb-light like a child looking at its mother. it was the weirdest thing i���d ever seen. they seemed to move like they had a mind of their own or were conscious or something. i don���t know how else to describe it. 

i���ve heard of people thinking they���ve seen ufos and such, but having never seen one myself, i would need hard evidence to believe any story like this from someone. especially if it were this out of the ordinary, so this notion of being skeptical and even second guessing yourself if witnessing 1st hand, i can understand completely. but if the evidence was there, i am not above admitting that these things may be possible. after the 3 light triangular thingy was in the sky for minute facing it���s mama blinking orb (which was on the right of the 3 light triangular thing), it rotated in mid air turning from right to left and so was facing away from me as it turned. i was still at my front door and my dog was barking at something but i was too busy watching these lights to notice what she was barking at, because she barks at everything! the rotation was a full ��� turn to face my left but still in same spot next to the blinking light which was still blinking and changing colors exactly the same as it had been. 

after the 3 light triangular thing was facing left and away from the blinking orb-light it left, but seemed to go much faster than the normal planes do and at closer range would have most definitely appeared totally hyper speed. it was gone in a few seconds but it didn���t just disappear in a flash, it gradually left my view toward the left and behind some trees obscuring my view. now the blinking light was still there just blinking away and changing color and was truly mesmerizing, but was it me or was this thing getting smaller and smaller and harder to see? yes it was. this was sooo weird! it was either moving further away or shrinking and now the color changing though i could tell it was still changing, was a bit harder to notice. 

about then, my neighbors pulled up, a nice couple next door, and parked in their normal spot and began walking to their door. they would pass me on the sidewalk and while i was starring up and my dog was still throwing a fit, but now over the approaching neighbors, i was trying to figure out how to ask them if they too had seen, or could see the light so as to not appear weird like a total freak. i reigned my dog in on her leash, and briefly scolded her for barking at the nice neighbors, and reminded her that it was the ���share area,��� as she had been used to having her own yard and now had to share a courtyard with other pesky people and dogs. as the neighbors passed me i asked ���do you guys see that light up there?��� they looked up and saw it immediately as this was the only light now in the sky and even stars were not out and it was still quite a bit bigger than any stars. it was still there just blinking away. i said ���yeah, it���s been there for a couple minutes now and changing all sorts of pretty colors. i���ve never seen anything like it.��� the light appeared to be smaller now, and had already gotten much smaller by the time the neighbors looked up. ���hmm.��� they said and starred for approx 15-20 secs, maybe a bit less. ���cool.��� and after the brief exchange they went inside, and i was kind of amazed they didn���t seem to care more. but it was late, and i���m sure they were tired, and as we live by an airport they may have totally just thought it thought it was another plane at night that was especially pretty as i didn���t mention the words ���do you think this is a ufo?��� to them, and except for the fact it was blinking and only had 1 color changing light, and was totally silent. 

then i realized it had indeed been totally silent this whole time and there was no normal ear-deafening jet noise, not even off in the distance. from where the light was it appeared to be fairly close to the flight path of planes as they take off or land, but a bit higher, but way too low, large and color-changing to be a star, planet, or other astronomical phenomenon. usually those planes in the take-off/landing path we can hear. also of note is that the direction the 3 light triangular thingy took off in was not consistent with the normal flight path we are used to. being much further to the left and though hard to describe, out towards another direction and went behind some trees eventually out of view. but the simple fact that it could hover was not consistent with any planes we know of! planes appear to move steady and the higher they are the slower they seem to go. so this 3 light thing would have been moving very fast for where it was in the sky. so now the blinking light was getting smaller it seemed with every several blinks. this is where it gets tricky to explain. if it were moving away it would have literally jumped a great distance, like teleporting, every time it blinked off, appearing again in another spot just a bit above and away from where it had previously been. as i began to ponder this i thought, it looks like about a centimeter to me if i held a ruler to the sky (and this is approx as i didn���t have a ruler and i would be cautious in my estimation bordering on just less than a cm rather than over a cm with each blink). but it didn���t move on every blink, just periodically every few seconds, and just continued blinking and changing color the whole time. those 2 things about it never stopped. finally after a couple more min (= about 4 minutes total but i could be a bit under and it may have been longer than 4 min) it was almost too small to detect at all, and i���m sure it was much further away, unless it was getting smaller in size. since it was dark i cannot be sure of which but our eyes and minds assume getting smaller equals further away. 

other than my neighbors briefly walking by, i noticed no other people who may have seen the whole thing as it was late so most were probably in bed. i hope someone else in town saw this too, as i can���t be the only nutty-sounding person tonight who saw this. i would like to remain anonymous, because i don���t want anyone to think i���m crazy for what i know i witnessed tonight. however, i wouldn���t mind if anyone at mufon had any questions about this event and they should know how to contact me. if anyone else in my area saw this, please speak up and report it, so i don���t look like a fool. normally i���d blow off something odd in my day, but this was just too odd to not do anything about, and if it can be helpful to anyone studying ufos or unknown things in the sky scientifically, then i offer my story for that purpose. i know i���m not nuts and even questioned myself as this was happening, like we as human are accustomed to doing in a bizarre event. but every time i blinked, it was still there and i know my neighbors saw a small piece of it toward the end, even though by then it was so small and easy to pass off as something coming from our local airport. 

this was not a plane! i didn���t see any aliens or anything like that and i wasn���t abducted, it was just a random sighting that was a bit too close for comfort, and too real to pass of as nothing. i pride myself on trying to be an honest person, and have no investments one way or another, nor any reason to put myself out there to share this story. i am a very private person, and am not one trying to be famous or wanting my picture everywhere. i like my privacy, but i would be willing to answer any questions by the people who are investigating these things running this site. i didn���t get any pics and will make some sketches as soon as i���m done reporting this and will hang onto them, but i���m not uploading those sketches here as i don���t have the means to because like i said, i value my privacy and i���m no artist. i am much better with words than a sketch pad, so i hope this helps, and many blessings to those who spent countless hours investigating this stuff. everything is as accurate and detailed as i can be. i will continue to make notes and do some digging to see if anyone else in town saw this oddity. i don���t know if it was just some government craft we���ve never heard of but i sure as heck couldn���t identify what these lights were, and that makes them ���unidentified��� in my normal, sane mind. i debated reporting this, but my hope is that it is helpful to the study. my head is just spinning trying to process this whole thing, so i���m glad that���s all i witnessed, but i guess i have a story for my grandkids, because i don���t think i can tell most people about this or they���ll think its nuts. its nuts to me and i was there.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Outside front door,saw blinking light changing colors& a 3 lighted triangularshapecraft seemed come out of blinking light,hover briefly,rotating 1/2 turn & sped off.Light stayed 2 more min after, hovering & left inoddwayinveryfastspurts/blinks!Otherssaw.

content.detailedDescription: The whole thing was combination of two emiting light objects, the base part was a constant light with simillar to square shape supported with one small flashing light from the left-bottom side. the whole thing was on static place for few minutes or seconds and then it start to move to the left/right, top/bottom and forward/backward and of its initial position then it stops for few minutes or seconds on new position. while doing that the base object was constantly emiting and the small one was emiting in impulses (3 short flashes) and on the fourth it was off. also it looks like it was rotating around its vertical axis, but not doing full 360 degrees.. maybe around 130-180 degrees in ping-pong style of cycle. after around a hour the whole thing become one "solid" circular or spherical object with more strong light than before and then it just turn off and dissappear.. like to turn off an electrical bulb. after a minute the forest on the hill below shined up twice.. and that was all
content.summary: Around 20m big object stay still above a hill, around 5-7 km far, staying still for some time then start to move somehow chaotic to the left/rigth and forward/backward, also slow rotate around its vertical axis wich.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, where i live must be a hotspot for ufos or something, this evening i decided to go star watching which i always do so i got my camera, compass, binoculars and watch and went outside, it was 5:56pm when i saw this orange light about the size of a pea move across the sky very fast only lasted about 10-15 seconds so i go my camera out and took footage of it and it went behind the trees but at first i thought it was a plane or something but i couldn`t hear anything when in the corner of my eye i saw the light stop in mid air behind all the trees but there were gaps in the tree so i watched it for a second when a big white light the same size of the normal object went up from it and stood there above it. i was so excited i was videoing it when i called my sister and dad out my my dad came out and the objects were gone but my dad came in and i was out there looking around where it happenened when i saw a light like a star dissapear and went to take a video but my camera died and didn`t work when it was on full battery. i was dissapointed but i knew i had the footage from before to see it so i went in to look at the video when i saw no object there and it must of been small or something, i don`t blame people for not trusting me on this what are the odds of that happening and me reporting so many sightings but i can make a bet if someone looks at the sky for about 2 hours where i live for a couple of days in a row you will atleast 1 thing weird. i have reported a sighting my dad and brother saw and 4 of my own in december 2008 to now. 

thanks and i don`t blame you for not beliving me i wouldn`t but i saw what i saw and the weather was clear as.
content.summary: Little lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I am in banner, il . the object is being viewd in a south west direction. 
it was hovering in the night sky. its moving rapidly left to right and then fades dim and then light. 
it must have been outside for hours.. it does not seem to go away . 
its very bright like the helicopter lights but dims in and out and again moves in all directions.. its like its being dangled on a string...

i was just walking the dog outside andoticed it in the clear night sky. i compared it to several visible stars in the sky and it was the brights . i am very familar with the stars at night in this area and i have never seen that there before... 

i am joking with friends saying there are ufos but this time i was right. 
the other person that viewed with me is a volunteer emt and firefigher
even after typing this for a few minutes i bet its still in the sky. 

i am so excited. i was joking with my friend and grabbed my very powerfull laser pin. i started point it at the light and flashing it on and off. i never expected to get a reaction. it seemed to stop moving and just got brighter. 

no point in taking a photo becuase it appears to look like a star. any video would be pointless due to shaking and not able to remain steady.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white star-like object moving rapidly in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: There were many of us at the club's observatory tonight to enjoy the clear sky and get some observing time in.  we also were watching the iss as it passed over but noticed the same small object that came up from behind and zipped by the iss very rapidly.  it was much smaller but was moving so fast it didn't take it any time to catch up with the iss, pass it and continue on until it was lost from sight. basically we saw the same as the group down in mt. pleasant, tx., case number 17241. the smaller object was most certainly not a standard satellite that we are very accustomed to seeing or any aircraft that any of us was familiar with. it pulsed in brightness as it flew by. from our location it remained approximately 10 degrees to the right of the iss at all times while in sight. it was surprising, astonishing actually, as to how fast this small pulsing object was moving. if there happens to be a satellite that moves at the same speed, well, it's the first time any of us have ever seen one and i can assure you we've seen more or less all of them.
content.summary: The same object was seen by many at the rmcc observatory - mounds, ok as reported from mt. pleasant, tx.

content.detailedDescription:
My son called me outside at 8:34 pm to the back yard to look at a jet airplane traveling ne - nw when i saw a cigar shaped craft (a thin dark tube with tapered ends encompased with white convex side edges) that moved slowly in a straight line 85 deg. n - ne in a clear blue sky for 5 - 10 sec > 1000 ft. without lights or any sound.  the craft was ~ 1/2 inch at arms length and its colors (edges) were slightly transparent.

i went inside to get binoculars and lost sight of the object as it traveled ne when returning to the back yard.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Cylinder,  Square,  Rectagular
content.summary: I saw a thin dark tube with tapered ends encompased with white convex side edges.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i watched the iss (international space station) fly over 2 nights ago and this time with her 14 year old daughter, the 3 of us were watching it again (on 5-29-09).  information on its position and time came form spaceweather.Com.  we knew when and where to look and it appeared at the exact time and location predicted.  we watched the iss for about 20 seconds and then all three of us, at the same time, saw another object moving and approaching it from behind.  initially we were all in disbelief that we were actually watching something we knew was the iss which was amazing itself and then something appeared that we couldn't explain.  we were all witnessing a ufo event.  the other, unidentified object overtook and moved past by the 
iss.  the ufo was moving 2.5 - 3 times faster than the iss.  they were moving in the same general direction but not the exact same heading.  it was definately not an airliner as it was moving much faster.  it had no colored lights.  it had a much dimmer appearance when compaired to the iss.  the ufo was not a constant light but did not blink, more of a random dimming and then back to bright appearance.  it was moving in a strait line.  we watched them both until they moved out of sight.  

ps.  i am a mufon field investigator,  #13357
content.summary: While watching the space station fly over another object appeared.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting would not be unusual except the object was moving away from my position and never varied in brightness, and emitted no sound. the brightness was of magnitude zero to minus one which would put it in the venus range.

i was sitting on the front porch since before dark enjoying the early evening  air. looked up accidently and saw a bright light overhead. object passed over central ft worth and moved to the south east at a speed of about 150 to 200 mph. hard to tell the altitude which would of course change the rate of speed. object never changed course as far as i could see; it moved over houses and trees out of sight. saw the object about 2 minutes. no sound at all.

being a rather avid sky watcher since high school days (i am now 57) this caught my eye as something unusual. rather than make a move for the binocs, i continued to just sit and watch to see where it went.

no tail-postion aircraft white light was ever this bright! this light had a bluish white color.

i have over 34 years as a private pilot, 27 years in aerospace writing flight manuals for fighter aircraft, and am an avid aircraft nut and radio control aircraft modeler. i am also an amateur astronomer since high school days (not too active these days) and am pretty familar with the night sky and how aircraft appear at night.

this will have importance only if someone else in the area saw the same thing to a greater extent than i. right now i have no idea what it was, but it was very unusual whatever the case.
content.summary: Bright light equal to venus, silent, never changing brightness or course, while moving away from me.

content.detailedDescription: Me my 6 year old neighbor and his 7 year old friend went walking around the night we saw a few plane then we saw something completly odd. it was a bright ball yellowish in color and went what looked to be slow but was actually faster then thought. we at first thought is was a plane but as it got closer we noticed it had aboslutly no flases so i thought may be it was not on. i looked harder and saw the light was all overthe object and then i saw the object it self was mostly the light. then another was about the ufos from prayer. i read online and saw the news about prophet yaweah a religious person who prayes for ufos and on the news tape you can see it for your self. so i decided to try it every one else online on a website said the got two bight flashes and the color was green. i did this and it matched othe claims which was seven and i was the eighth.
content.summary: Flash:if you heard of prophet y then you know about he prayers i did and preformed it many times i got two distinct flashes of strange green light. the other resembeled a bright stedy deathstar.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking with some friends down garden street towards the collin bennet building. 
while walking south from albany avenue in between ashley street and collins street 
i looked up into the night sky. i noticed a solid light 
 from a close distance i immediately thought it was a helicopter. 
so i listen for the noise of the motor but the object made no noise. 
 i tried to alert my friends of this strange object with no sound
but i could not because i felt in a trance or mesmerized by the sight.
so i thought to myself it was heading in the south direction so
it should pass over the collin-bennet building and the reflection of the light
should illuminate the building and the object because it was passing at a 
low altitude so i stared. continuing to walk down the sidewalk my friends 
was talking. i was so amazed with what i was seeing i did not hear a word they 
were saying. with anticipation the object finally proceeded to pass over the building
and truthfully what i saw next is indescribable but i will try my best. the light hit the building at a very close proximity and it looked very dim and controlled.                                  the light illuminated a very small portion of the building unlike nothing i have ever seen before. 
i believed the object was no more than 10 feet from the top of the building.
so the light should have been more visible. the light from the object was only 
visible within a diameter of no more than 5-10 feet. i never seen that in a beam of light.
after the object passed out of sight range i immediately turned to my 
friends and said" did you see that "?. they looked at me with such confusion it still effects me to this day. its been seventeen years and i still think about that day. 
i cant get it out of my head so i decided to write you. 
this date has an emotional connection because a week later my uncle eric anderson
died of cancer so that���s why i am sure that it was in april of 1992.
no later than the last week of march 1992 for any skeptics. the object moved slow, steady, and balanced about 5 mph when it passed over the
building there was no type of vibration or movement. i also remember that night the news had reported a strange light over downtown hartford connecticut.
content.summary: I saw something strange in the night sky 17 years ago and i can't forget it.

content.detailedDescription:
This description is extracted from the mufon field investigator report made by cameron pack.

the witness was on his break outside in the parking lot while working when he had his sighting.  there was a loose group formation of seven orb-like objects coming from the southern sky and moving north.  the formation was not of any particular style.  (see attached sketch drawn by the witness.)  the objects traveled at a speed moderate enough to be seen and able to be identified as something that was not man-made, but they did travel at a fairly high-speed in comparison to conventional aircraft.  the formation was completely silent and left no vapor trail.  the objects did not waver or wobble while moving and stayed together in a straight line path during the entire time that the witness observed them.  the objects were very bright and shiny to give the appearance to the witness of a new headlight being caught in direct sunlight while turned off.  the objects maintained equal brightness and shape during the entire time that the witness observed them.  the witness stated that the color of the objects appeared to be similar to that of a bright white flare when lit.  the witness estimated that the objects were at between 6,000 and 10,000 feet in altitude.  the entire formation of the objects gave the appearance that they were about four to five times the size of an airliner at the same altitude.  there was an airliner present at the time of the sighting and was traveling from south to northeast.  the witness stated that the aircraft could have possibly seen or picked up the objects on radar.  also, the witness stated that the objects passed over the ocean naval air station as they went out of view from him and no doubt there might have been witnesses on base and possibly tracking of the objects by radar.
content.summary: A formation of seven bright, shiny, white colored orbs passed quickly and silently overhead in straight lines with no change in altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
The following is extracted from the mufon field investigator report made by cameron pack.

the witness was laying face-up on the flight-line of nellis air force base waiting for the jets that he was responsible for as maintenance crew chief to return to the base when his sighting occurred.  the sky was completely clear at this time.  the witness stated that there was dry, cool air that day and not too much distortion when viewing the sky and aircraft.  he noticed in the sky directly above him at the zenith that there appeared to be several objects in the sky.  there were four objects total, with three being stationary and one in motion.  all four objects were fairly close together.  the objects were clearly defined and appeared as little white dots in the sky.  the color of the objects was described by the witness as being a white color and he approximated the exact shade to be the color of a clover flower.  the witness estimated the size of the objects to be a little bigger than a star seen in the night sky.  the altitude of the objects was stated by the witness to be very high and estimated to be at least 30,000 feet.  the three stationary objects appeared to be in some type of formation.  the one object that was in motion was performing maneuvers which the witness described as being impossible for any man-made aircraft, classified or not, to perform, as he stated that the amount of g-forces being put upon the object would have caused death for any human pilot.  the witness drew the maneuvers of the object on a piece of paper as being very tight loops, turns and circles.  (see attached witness sketch.)  the objects did not appear to reflect any light and did not appear shiny at all.  there was no halo-effect or any vapor trails being exhibited by the objects.  the witness called over three other us air force personnel to witness what he was seeing, with only two being able to see the objects, as one wore glasses and did not have excellent vision.
content.summary: There were three stationary white colored objects with a fourth nearby that was performing tight circles and loops that no human could withstand high in the sky over nellis afb

content.detailedDescription: What prompted my contact with your organization is seeing a report on tv describing a craft very closely resembling one in my experience. in my case, there was an "element" involved that in my experience no other object, situation or activity could "generate" i would think that anyone who encountered this, well, craft for lack of a better word, would be able to describe this "element". to my knowledge, no witnesses have spoke of this, it may even be my own experience may be unique, possibly due to close proximity. anyway, it would help me considerably to hear someone credibly confirm what i would think would be a unmistakeable experience, in addition to a sighting. i am not referring in any way to abductions, tests, little gray or green creatures or any popular beliefs concerning unknown activities. anyway, i'd be willing to speak under confidential circumstances, and would prefer to speak with anyone who has encountered this craft (same general shape as illinois description, no lights) regards, [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Close pass.

content.detailedDescription: I had just put my children to bed and around 11:30 i went outside on my deck to smoke a cig. i was standing there and about half way through my cig i noticed a green light reflecting in the water i looked up and saw 3 lights about the size of softballs about 20 feet above the water. at first they were close together i would say about 6 feet apart in a tryangler shape. i stood there just looking at them for a second or so, then they spread apart and i'm not sure what happend after that because i was surrounded with a greenlight that was so bright i couldn't even see, i had to  squint my eyes. then it just vanished. i stood there my cigarett and my small black lighter that was in my hand was gone no where to be found and i just walked inside. i didn't know what time it was becuase all my clocks were blinking. my computer wouldn't turn on and all the lights i had left on were out. they came back on after a few min. i sat down on the couch no knowing what just happend i wasn't sure if i shoud call someone or what so i tried calling my friend who is the founder of the paranormal society i'm in but he didn't answer the phone. so i just ate some food and sat there all night, i didn't even go to sleep until morning and my children didn't go to school that day because  i am a paranormal investigater, i have been for about 10 years. i have never seen anything like this.It wasn't a plane. it wasn't some sort of light from a house and it was defently not a ghost.  what ever it was it scared the living  [cms/tg/pd] out of me... (excuse my launguage) i want to move becasue i'm not sure what it was or if it's going to happen again. tonight since i am all about proof i am going to go outside and sit on my deck and see if it happends again, i have a camera and a voice recorder. but this time i'm not going to have my children home and i'm not doing it alone. this has never happend to me before so i'm pretty freaked about it.
content.summary: 3 green lights that were bright and the shape of a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: We (brother, friend, and i) had been sky watching at daniels park, lone tree, colorado (exact location: 39���28'35.11"n, 104���55'26.43"w) observing various conventional aircraft in the airspace around us. it���s a beautiful, bluebird day; we could clearly identify the aircraft around us, and daniels park is secluded so we could hear what propulsion system they utilized. at 1:22pm mst  i noticed a circular, white object to the west between the foothills and our location, situated directly over the lockheed martin space systems company property in jefferson county. the property is approximately 5 miles south of deer creek canyon road and the junction of highway 75 and s. wadsworth blvd. i first thought it was some sort of equipment on the side of the foothills, until it appeared to flatten out, or rotate to its horizontal axis, and float south (with the wind). i pointed it out to the group, and they thought it could be a paraglider, or hang glider, due to its fluid motions and its trajectory with the wind. it then came to a stop, hovered for +/- 1 min. and began to move north (against the wind). when the object began moving northbound, it light up with an immense, white light, almost like burning magnesium. at this time, there were not any aircraft in the airspace around us; we did not hear a sound emanating from the object. the distance between our location at daniels park and the foothills is 11 miles, and we could clearly make out its white disc shape against the very green foothills, thanks to the rain as of late. the object continued northbound, and increased its elevation because we lost it for a second when it was between us and the snow-capped mount evans. when we re-spotted the object, it had changed its trajectory and was heading east, seemingly over highlands ranch and then to aurora, when it began heading north. it continued north, and from our vantage point appeared to be between buckley afb and denver international airport. we lost it in some clouds to the north and we did not see it again. i checked www.Flightaware.Com to see if any flights were active in that specific area over the lockheed plant during the time of our sighting, and nothing was recorded.
content.summary: White disc spotted over lockheed martin facility in colorado.

content.detailedDescription:
Un contacto visual extraterrestre ( mi historia )
que cambio el rumbo de mi vida hasta el momento 

bueno un dia 15 de junio estando dentro de mi casa ya en mi recamara pude sentir una sensacion de salir para afuera de mi casa y mirar el cielo...

pero mas fuerte fue que senti que denia subir a mi terraza en el tercer (3������)piso de la casa 

ya arriva estuve contemplando el cielo como si estuviera esperando algo,
ya que estuve un tiempo pude ver en el cielo ( dos ) grandes esferas y a la vez pude sentir algo dentro de mi cuerpo. una energia inexplicable. 
no podia creer eso que miraba y duraron mucho tiempo alli en el cielo
las esferas estavan rodeadas de un tipo de energia , paresian un tipo de ( huevos fritos ) como lo muestran estas fotos que les envio de ellas
se puede apresiar como referencia los arboles que estan frente a mi casa
y que aun estan ahi para si un dia quieren venir a investigar 

ya que paso la tarde y llego la noche yo no podia despegarme de alli algo sobrenatural algo dentro de mi me detenia ese dia , llegaron las 09 :00 p.M. y pude ver un circulo de esferas , como si fuese la parte de abajo de una nave...
pero ahora en el lado sur de mi terraza frente a una termoelectrica

en la primer foto puede verse como el ovni esta mas o menos en la copa de un arbol y en la segunda foto ya esta mas serca de mi, a una altura creo yo de 30 metros 

bueno lo interesante es que desde ese dia 15 de junio del 2007 puedo mirar y videograbar fotografiar una gran cantidad de fotos ( cientos de fotos y videos ) ahorita tendre mas de mil fotos ovni originales y con sus propiedades de cada foto ...

lo importante es que tengo identificada una nave extraterrestre ,tengo muchas fotos de una sola nave en plena evolucion

aqui les envio algunas fotos ovni que eh tomado desde ese dia , tengo una facilidad para poderles captar,

bueno aunque no sera facil que crean en mi caso me encantaria que me hisieran una investigacion , aparte aqui mismo les demostraria en persona como hago para captales a los ovnis...

soy de mexico y pienso que aqui no hay la calidad de investigadores ovni que ustedes tienen ������ por que pienso eso ? 

eh visto el tipo la seriedad y la calidad de investigacion que ustedes manejan ... eh visto casos en los programas de discovery chanel

por favor no me ignoren tengo el mejor caso y cientos de fotografias de una nave que cambia de formas...  

bueno tengo una web oficial  www.Evidenciaextraterrestre2007.Com
esta web la hice para poner fotos de las que tomo cada dia y cada mes y cada a������o desde el dia 15 de junio del 2007

no quiero publicidad ni nada de eso
quiero compartir mi caso y mi descubrimiento de una nave que por tener cientos de fotos se como evolusiona

cuando gusten se podran llevar evidencia tomada por mi en el momento que ustedes esten aqui investigando aqui en mi casa...

( cualquier prueva necesaria que quieran esta a disposicion de ustedes )

 saludos al director internacional de mufon, james carrion
content.shape: Boomerang,  Cigar,  Circle,  Diamond,  Disc,  Square,  Rectagular
content.summary: Un dia 15 de junio del 2007 pude ver y recibir un tipo de contacto extraterrestre visual y espiritual.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside siting in my car smoking a cigaret , i was facing south in a parking lot out side my girl friends house . a storm had just , just passed over head the sky became clear and i could see the stars . this ocured in johnston rhode island right over the town , i was on mill street off of plainfeild pike a main road near the house ! i look up for a split second and bam ! there it is , it originated from with in the big dipper , i clearly looked at the big dipper wich is right over head in the sky at this time of year and at this time of night 930 10 pm . this realy bright craft illuminated as if it was coming directly down from with in the big dipper . it looked like a star at first but then it obviously got coser to earth , it entered the atmosphere actualy that is how bright this craft got . after diving in it slowly traveled south heading for providence the main city in ri . it was a brief encounter only a couple of minutes long , after it reached over head the city it gradually inclined back upward into space. i followed it the whole way, how could anyone miss this thing. the glow of the craft slowly faded as it returned into space and it dissapeared into the blackness of space. this isnt the only encounter that has ocured in my town and state i have witnessed countless craft in the sky some more amazing then others but still as exciting , you just have to take the time to look up !! 

my belief is that the craft showed up a little bit to late , it missed the electrical storm that just passed over rhode island . it makes alot of sense lightning is an extreme power source , and that craft definatly needs an extreme fuel to travel across the galaxy or further . so i beileve he was going to stop in quick to catch a quick recharge in the lightning storm , but just missed the storm and headed back out to find fuel else where . 

please contact me as soon as possible i have other sightings from the past i would love to discus with someone . i witnessed on 8/8/04 a craft that originated from almost the same location as this one . it entered earths atmosphere and hovered there for a good 5 minutes , then i witnessed somthing i will never forget for the rest of my life , this craft took off at the speed of light , it left a huge blue arch in the sky i followed the arch until it dissapeared into a pin prick . this craft type is very common around here most that i have seen have originated from the same location and most of them where white hot and circular in shape . what i dont understand is how do they pin point earth , or not even earth they can pin point citys and towns , what makes them travel so far to earth or rhode island for that mater . this sighting was a group sighting with my brother and 2 of his freinds so other people have seen them and do beileve you just have to be patient and search the skys , or lucky for that mater its not every day you see somthing like this . i am a very honest person and would not lie about such a life changing experiance please believe me , they are real !
content.summary: There was a storm on sunday night before memorial day. i was outside around 9:10 pm and a craft dipped into the atmosphere, originating from the big dipper it slowly pased over then gently elevated out of the atmosphere into space on a gradual incline.

content.detailedDescription: The video from puerta espana has been on youtube for the last year under "haiti ufo".
content.summary: Re: puerta espana

content.detailedDescription:
After driving back home (in broadstone, dorset) from seeing my girlfriend at roughly twenty minutes past eleven (gmt). i suddenly noticed a small silver, egg shaped object approx. three hundred feet in the air, just over ridgeway park.

upon stopping the car along dunyeats road and inspecting it for awhile, it appeared to simply hover in mid-air. no lights were operating upon it's surface and the definition of the shape was clear enough.

it was a 'sideways egg' more or less and it's point was west facing. it had no motion, but as i stepped out of the car to check it out, i started to feel the windows of my car vibrate as i closed my side door. there was a gorgeous low bass-line emitting from what i thought was the object, as no other cars or industrial equipment was operating near-by. there was a slight tingling from listening to the noise, a gentle massaging effect that did not upset me physically.

being a a boom operator, i quickly hooked up my rode ntg-2 and field recorder from my boot and held the boom up as high as i could. i even thought about standing on the roof of my car.

at about twenty to midnight, the humming slowly faded away and the object just simply blended into the night sky. not an instant effect, but one that if you were to look back at, it would be gradually less and less visible to the eye.

the recording is in wav format, but i have (attempted) to clean up the pulses.

there have been a few recent sightings of lights over the local heathland, but as of yet, this thing was the most intriguing.

- tobe
content.summary: Localised dorset 'sighting' and recording.

content.detailedDescription:
while i was at work this morning myself and about 20 other co workers seen disc shaped objects high in the sky over phoenix.  there were 14 to b exact, they were stationary, other than the fact that they changed formation over 8 time while i was observing them.  they did not move across the sky until 2 hours later when we observed them moving quite fast than all coming to a stop, and than moved again until the disappeared. 

  i have been in the military for well over 18 years (retired).  what i had saw was not a weather balloon as i have seen plenty in my lifetime while stationed around the world.  these lights in the sky had intelligent moving about them and seemed like they were changing formations about every 15 to 20 min.  i had my whole crew come to look at them as well as other employees at the warehouse that i work.  we all agreed that the objects in the sky were odd and nothing any of us had ever seen.
content.summary: 14 disc shaped objects high in sky.

content.detailedDescription: We went outside on our porch overlooking the lake to see if it was raining and we thought we saw a plane. we kept looking and it disappeared behind a cloud, thats when we thought it actually disappeared and thats what caught our attention. so we kept looking. it seemed odd it wasnt moving like a plane would thats what eventually kept our attention. the object came back it was round in the center but without staring hard it looked like a star. it was flashing white and pink in varying frequencies really fast and sometimes slower and it kept zipping up and down. it was facing north, northwest. then it looked like something either came out off it or fell off eventually it blinked some more getting faster and then it just wasnt there.
content.summary: Round flashing with pink and white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
This statement is in fact two reports of the same craft seen twice within a three week period.

i do not remember the exact date but in the second week of may 2009 a co-worker and myself were dumping trash in a dumpster out behind the building we work at.  the area is poorly lighted and is located near the city limits of stephenville.  the time was around 12:30am and the sky was overcast as we were heading back toward the building my co-worker pointed to the sky and exclaimed "what the hell is that?".  what i saw appeared to be a very large triangle shaped craft, kind of a mix between a boomerang and triangle shape.  if i had to be more exact, i would say it looked like a hang glider.  i only saw it for a couple of seconds, it appeared to be a gray color and seemed to have a dim glow to it with no external lighting visable.  it was traveling very fast and disappeared into the overcast.

second sighting:

on may 28th 2009 at around 1am, the same co-worker and myself again were in the same area dumping trash.  the weather was clear, no wind and quiet.  i happen to look to the west and saw something dimly lit and coming towards our position, the track of the object was from west to east and i estimate it's altitude to be approxamatly one to two thousand feet.  as it passed, it had a dim gray glow and made no sound.  i could see what appeared to the the lights of the city reflecting off of it as it passed over them.  i estimate the size to be roughly the size of a boeing 737 commercial airliner.  after it passed our position, it appeared to bank sharply and that is when we saw the same triangle or hang glider shape we had seen three weeks earlier.  there were no external lights but was easy to see because of the dim glow it seemed to have.  i am a poor judge of speed, but it was moving very fast.  my co-worker estimated it was traveling at least 400 to 500 mph.  the one thing that stands out about the whole incident, is how there seemed to be electricity in the air, like static electricity, like your hair was standing on end.  it took several minutes to get over that feeling.
content.summary: Triangle-shaped craft heading east at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter called me stating that the local radio is talking about 11 to 16 disks in the sky above chandler (she was driving to work and couldn't see). i went out my front door talking to her and initially looked in the direction of chandler, nw, to try and see what she was talking about. didn't see anything and joked with her about needing to drive into chandler to try and observe what the radio was talking about. said good byes. i then went back out and leaned on my honda roof and slowly started to scan the sky in the direction of chandler. i then came across 2 white/shiny disks/orbs at about a 35degree angle. they were side by side with about a pinky width between them. i then continued scanning the skyline, due to the reported 11 to 16, and ended up observing 7 more white/shiny orbs/disks at about a 45 degree angle that stuck out against the clear blue sky.  this second set of obrs/disks were in 2 groups. one group of three were in a triangle pattern while the other was in a box formation (one orb/disk in each corner of a "box" and a "triangle" formation. ran in and told my wife (which she just laid there) and then grabbed the camera and proceeded to take 40 pictures with my vivitar, vivicam 5386, 3x zoom f=5.4-16.2mm. by this time my wife walked out to see what i was talking about (her eyes were still adjusting to waking up, and didn't see anything).  she advised i should wake up my 8yr old to have her come look.  during the whole time of observing, i was quit elated that i finally got to see things in the sky. my eyes kept feeling wierd, trying to adjust on such small objects. (photo attached, zoom into the bottom center of the picture, right of the date)
content.summary: Observed nine circles, nw of queen creek, over chandler. they went from a box formation to triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription:
Occurred : 9/8/2002 23:13 (entered as : 09/08/02 23:13)
reported: 9/9/2002 8:24:04 pm 20:24
posted: 3/21/2003
location: fallon, nv
shape: triangle
duration:10 seconds fallon triangle seen by ufo television talk show host

sept. 8 2002 11:13 pm while outside having a smoke i was looking north of 1880 auction rd when i saw a dark shadow of substance dimly lit hugh craft fly by at about 1000 feet. this craft traveled west down williams ave with no running lights but dimmly lit light nodes were seen but they were not lit. the nodes were in the shape of the whole craft, triangle. estimate amount of speed i would say 20 mph or faster. no noise was associated with the craft. i was completely surprised of this event and said why me. i have hosted a ufo television talk show for ten years of which mr. davenport has been a guest many times. i believe this was the true and real triangle craft. it was so completely unexpected yet there it was so close and so huge. i did not see a leading edge or rear of craft i just saw a triangle from the side and bottom of the ship. the sky was clear and about 70 degrees.
content.summary: The fallon triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
Hola amigos.
bueno, lo que yo vi esa madrugada aqui en mi casa de lima-peru
fueron 8 discos color marron claro, del tamano de un boton de
un saco de hombre, de los costados soltaban uns ""gas-humo-esca
pe,color rojo intenso- 
era un formacion de 8 discos silenciosos que se desplazan del
mar (oceano pacifico)- en direccionb a los andes- de suroeste
a este.
perfectamente en fila, uno detras de otro, no tengo referencias
de tamano, ya que no tenia punto de referencia, estaban entre
las nubes.
carlos muro
telef. 461-5595
lima peru
content.summary: Discos (brown).

content.detailedDescription: Estaba haciendo una filmacion de las estrellas, en la terraza de mi casa, situada en el barrio compartir de soacha (colombia) y en la camara queda grabado el sigiente evento: un objeto ovalado de rapidos movimientos de un color no muy especifico, despues de unos segundos se pone de color azul cielo intencificandose cada vez mas, en el centro se ve de color blanco, siempre titilando, dura unos segundos quieto y vuelve y se mueve, viendose todo blanco como la nieve y mas peque������o pero con la misma forma, luego sigue su moviento como en un principio y el tono vuelve a ser tenue y sigue titilando en el centro, siempre mantengo la camara fija; todo lo tengo grabado en una cinta de vhs  (es grabacion unica)
content.summary: En cielo un objeto ovalado que cambia de color.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in my son's car facing west.  looking up about 45%, i noticed a commercial airliner at about 20,000 ft. with a long contrail.  while seeing this, my eye was caught by a really bright oval also flying south, as bright as the high wispy clouds, going pretty much even with the ground.  if i held out my hand & measured with my fingers, as long as my pinky is wide. it appeared to be flying just below the clouds, faster than the jet.  i tried hard to make out a tail or wings (no contrail behind it) but it's edges were too fuzzy.  if i could identify a commercial passenger jet flying at 20k, why couldn't i identify an aircraft flying lower & closer?  i pointed it out to my son when he got back in the car; he squinted at it & said it was just a plane.  i let it go & forgot about it until i saw the report & pics from near portland airport which is about 15-20 miles north of here.  same shape but bright white.
content.summary: Saw similar object as that guy in portland.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my deck having a cigarette before work when i noticed a bright light off in the distance. i live near an airport and have seen many numbers of planes and helicopters. there is also an army base at the airport. civilian and military airplanes & helicopters frequent the area. this particular light was stationary and was glowing blue and white. the light was also in the opposite direction of the airport. at first i thought another plane, but the light was floating there over houses. the planes that land at the airport have a designated flight path that does not pass over any housing areas. i went inside and grabbed my camera off the fireplace hearth and snapped a series of 3 photos. it was tough to snap a photo as it was dark, so i placed the camera on the deck railing to gain support and zoomed in. i only have a 10x zoom lens. just as i was looking at the view finder the light slowly dissapated and where gone.
i'm not sure what to make of the pictures. what i do know is that this light was not any sort of plane, or helicopter. 100%....  while examing the photos in photoshop i was able to zoom in on the object. notice how the stars around the object are stationary but the lights seemed blurred as if it were vibrating or moving. you can also see the tree branches in my yard as the object was in the distance.
content.summary: Bright lights got my attention while having a smoke.

content.detailedDescription: All of the past sightings of this object are simply the international space station passing over. you can check out the iss wesite for a real-time schedule for viewing. i always check the website before i go camping, so that i can show it to my friends. sorry, but this is not a ufo.
content.summary: Starlike object moving west to east.
